title: lina2018

content: Are you a crypto content creator? Do you have active Youtube channel that over 25 subscribers and 4 videos on your Youtube channel? But you have not paid a single penny from YouTube. It’s time to connect your YouTube channel in Gleev and get paid for your every video. Gleev is a video sharing platform powered by Joystream. Terms and Conditions1) All Participants must join Gleev Youtube Partner Program by Using This Link2) Have to use Youtube mail to Sign Up Youtube Partner Program3) You have to 25 subscribers and 4 videos in your Youtube channel. YouTube channel needs to be older than 1 month.4) All participants must join this telegram group: https://t.me/lcampaigns20235) You must provide Binance Pay ID to get paid. Participants can not change their Binance Pay ID after registration. Please double check your Binance Pay ID before registration. 6) Format for proof of authentication post: Quote #PROOF OF REGISTRATION Telegram UsernameYouTube Profile LinkBinance Pay IDReward: Approved Participant will get 1 USDT for signing up Gleev Youtube Partner Program(YPP)How to join: 1. Fill the registration Form- https://forms.gle/rDXCSfhTaCdDHwNw82. Verify your status in Spreadsheet- https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Mmr6vS8EvKoh33D2jYU2EAYmi4sn-pDEaVVnKqRwpG8/edit?resourcekey#gid=1299366734Note:This Bounty arranged by CryptoBD School. Payment Will send to eligible participants from CryptoBD School fund every week

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Our youtube content have to synced with Gleeve?

comments.author: lina2018
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on December 15, 2023, 02:56:16 PMOur youtube content have to synced with Gleeve? When you sign up in Gleev your Youtube video will be auto sync in Gleev platform. All newly signed up channels are reviewed by the Joystream verification team and rewards are paid to the channels based on the allocated tier.For Diamond tier you will get 200 USD for sign up and you will get 8 usd per sync video every weekFor Gold tier you will get 100 USD for sign up and will get 5 usd per sync video every weekFor Silver tier you will get 50 USD for sign up and will get 3 usd per sync video every weekFor Bronze tier you will get 2 USD for sign up and will get  no rewards for sync video
